roleset.name: send (a case) back to a lower court, or a prisoner back to prison
roleset.note: REMAND-V NOTES: Use of DIR here is warranted because the 'back' was outside theto-phrase but formed a natural constituent. Otherwise extract thepreposition as usual. (from remand.01-v)

example.name: glad this showed all args
example.text: SciMed said the appeals court remanded the case back to the district court for further proceedings.
